AD.name: Default Response Format
AD.description: The default response format to return results as if no format parameter is supplied in the query

AD.name: Default Fuzzy Search
AD.description: The default value for the 'fuzzy' parameter (for textual searches) if it is not supplied in the query. Checked means true

AD.name: Default Page Size (Count)
AD.description: The default number of results to return per page if the 'count' parameter is not supplied in the query

AD.name: Default Query Timeout (Seconds)
AD.description: The default number of seconds a query should wait before timing out if no response is returned, if the timeout parameter is not supplied in the query.

AD.name: Default Radius (Meters)
AD.description: The default number of meters to use as the radius for point radius queries if the 'radius' parameter is not supplied in the query, but the 'lat' and 'lon' parameters are

AD.name: Default Date Type
AD.description: The default date type value to use no 'dtType' parameter is supplied in the query, but a atleast one of 'dtStart' or 'dtEnd' is specified.

AD.name: Query Request Cache Size
AD.description: The number of query IDs (OID) to keep in cache to check against when checking for unique queries.

AD.name: Default to deduplicate results
AD.description: Check the box if you want to deduplicate results from multiple sources
